title: Multimedia-Based E-Learning System Development: Application in Science Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening capabilities in developing science education systems utilizing multimedia content such as lab videos, 3D modeling, and virtual reality

learning_goals: Ability to select at least three optimal media types (audio-visual, simulation, etc.) per learning topic during multimedia content modeling
Ability to derive at least five technical requirements (HTML5, LMS integration, etc.) for e-learning system integration
Developed multimedia content achieves over 80% learning effectiveness (information delivery, interactivity) through formative evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
